html:
Sleek Sweater

o.p.t Nicole Dress

For days when you can’t bear to peel yourself out of your warm bed, opt for a cozy sweater dress. This brown number is the ideal weight for chilly spring days and looks chic with boots, socks, and loafers—or even a suede sneaker.

Sizes: XS-XL

Easy to Wear

Staud Jay Dress

Hello, fellow lazy girls. For days when you want to thoughtlessly throw something on and still look put-together, grab this effortless option, complete with a chic leather polo collar.

Sizes: XS-XL

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Rosy Red

Likely Carro Dress

While florals for spring are far from groundbreaking, they’re typically reserved for daytime looks. Not only does this evening-ready halter dress show off your shoulders, but it gets a seasonally-apt touch with a rosette—a style frequently seen on celebs like Selena Gomez.

Sizes: 00-14

Under $100

English Factory Combo Shirtdress

Shopbop’s Amazon storefront has a slew of office-ready dresses, like this sweater and shirtdress combo that takes all of the guesswork out of layering. What’s more, it’s available in four colors, lands under $100, and is tied with an adorably demure bow.

Sizes: XS-XL

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Classic Slip

DANNIJO Midi Slip Dress

Everyone needs a classic slip dress in their closet—or several. We like this black midi, which can easily be dressed up with heels or styled with sneakers, a white tee underneath, and an oversized jacket or blazer for casual weekend plans.

Sizes: XS-XL

Off the Shoulder

Lioness Field of Dreams Maxi Dress

With a slightly metallic finish, pretty pleats, and a drop-waist, this knit gown will make you the most comfortable—and chicest—guest at the wedding.

Sizes: 3XS-4XL

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Pretty Polka Dots

Free People Butterfly Babe Midi Dress

If it’s been years since you sported polka dots, you can’t go wrong with this vintage-inspired number, complete with lace detailing.

Sizes: XS-XL

Wear-Everywhere Midi

Staud Wells Dress

No closet is complete without a black midi. Best of all, Staud is one of ELLE editors’ favorite brands, so we love that it’s conveniently sold on Amazon via Shopbop.

Sizes: 00-16

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Sheer Trend

Lioness Prophecy Maxi Dress

I bought the black version of dress months ago and have honestly worn it 45 times. For New Year’s Eve, birthday parties, date night—if you saw me on the streets of New York recently, I was probably wearing this dress. With a lacy bra and full-coverage undies underneath? To die for. This white version will be on repeat all spring and summer long.

Sizes: XS-3XL

Classic Tweed

Retrofête Amanda Tweed Dress

Anyone who thinks tweed is stuffy will immediately reconsider after seeing this mini, which is complete with subtle sparkle and bold silver buttons. Whether you style it with tall boots or a classic heel, you’ll be putting a modern spin on a formal fabric.

Sizes: XS-XL

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Silky Slit

Amanda Uprichard Matthews Dress

Don’t let the demure knee length of this silky dress fool you: The plunging neckline and thigh-high slit add a sexy flair, while the deep navy shade pops against any skin tone.

Sizes: XS-XL

Smocked Midi

o.p.t Tuscany Dress

If your nap dress collection needs a refresh, might we suggest this bold blue? Give the style’s signature fluttery sleeves and smocked bodice the edgy treatment with a metallic shoe and chunky jewelry.

Sizes: XS-XL

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Effortless Shirtdress

Xirena Boden Dress

A crisp white shirtdress will quickly become the workhorse of your closet. Style this versatile long-sleeved option with a sweater for the office, strappy sandals for the warmer days ahead, or unbuttoned over a bathing suit on your next vacation.

Sizes: XS-L

Slinky Cheetah

Norma Kamali Diana Gown

Animal prints are here to stay, so go ahead and make a statement. If the cheetah print isn’t bold enough for you, the body-hugging fit and one-shoulder design surely will be.

Sizes: XS-XL

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Fits Like a Glove

Almere Basic Strapless Maxi Dress

It can be hard to find bodycon dresses that work with you instead of against you, but this versatile tube dress will hug you in all the right places.

Sizes: XS-XL
